comment: Honestly I like watching tiktok and the videos are so cool, but there are tons of complaints. First of all I can't fund my REPOST BUTTON. This is very annoying also I can't even send messages on tiktok even though u did nothing, I can't even find the msg button also. Plz I'm to check this out... I'm very upset at this point.. like what's the use of using tiktok . One more thing I don't have the button to like... select emojis... there are only 5 emojis I'm using.. tysm
key sentence: User does not have the button to select from a full range of emojis and is limited to using only 5 emojis.
